description: This is a Kotlin data class representing a Note entity for use with Room database in an Android application. It contains properties for id, title, content, and timestamp, with annotations for database entity configuration.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: A data class representing a Note object with annotations for Room database.

methods.name: UUID.randomUUID
methods.description: Generates a random UUID for the note ID.

methods.name: System.currentTimeMillis
methods.description: Returns the current system time in milliseconds to set the timestamp.
